title: Eucalyptus Mint "Fearless" Affirmation Candle - 17.5 oz
description:
Experience the empowering fragrance of the" Fearless" Eucalyptus Mint Affirmation Candle, designed to inspire fearlessness. The top notes of refreshing eucalyptus and invigorating peppermint combine to uplift and energize your senses. A touch of cedar in the middle provides a grounding effect, while the base notes of patchouli and vanilla create a warm, soothing aroma. Made with coconut wax for a clean, vegan, and pet-friendly burn, this 17.5 oz candle comes in a reusable clear jar with two flat braided cotton wicks that are lead and zinc-free. Enjoy up to 60 hours of burn time with this high-quality candle, perfect for a refreshing and rejuvenating aromatherapy experience.
